channel.title: Wow on The blog of Heschlie
channel.description: Recent content in Wow on The blog of Heschlie

item.title: Tinkering with Battlenets REST API
item.description: So a couple years ago I started teaching myself programming, there was a lot of bumps along the way, and knowing what I know now I probably would have done things much differently, but isn’t that always the case. Anyway, back then I started with Python and Perl as they were relevant to what I was trying to do in my sysadmin work, but quickly branched out to Java, C/C++, and tinkered in some other languages.
